name: Dark Ark
description:
It’s the end of the world, and you were chosen as one of the lucky few to board the Ark of Arks: Bob’s boat. 

(Noah was still workshopping the name).

As an intern, you had only one job: count the animals. 

And, well, you made a *slight* miscalculation. 

There’s two of… almost everything, but... 

the single, lonely animal blinks. You are convinced it is mocking you. 

If Noah notices there is only one, you are done for. 

Time to get creative...
